list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an aquatic or terrestrial annelid worm with suckers at both ends. Many species are bloodsucking parasites, especially of vertebrates, and others are predators.
a person who extorts profit from or sponges on others.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they are leeches feeding off the hardworking majority

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the after or leeward edge of a fore-and-aft sail, the leeward edge of a spinnaker, or a vertical edge of a square sail.
